base.a1: You can upload 5 files at once
base.click: Click the button to create a knowledge base
base.generateTooltip: Click AI Generate Button after enter your base's name and description to auto generate an icon for you base, you can generate icons up to 3 time.
base.n1: Deleting this file may render other chatbots that are linked to it unavailable. Are you sure you want to delete it?
base.name: Knowledge base name
base.no_date: No files yet. Go ahead and upload your files

place.description: Here is the description of the knowledge base
place.name: Give the knowledge base a unique name

ruleMessage.icon: Please upload a knowledge base icon
ruleMessage.name: Please fill in the name of the knowledge base

title.deleteSub: All files in the knowledge base and the binding relationships of the assistant will be deleted. Do you confirm the deletion?

base.uplaodSupportLocal: Various forms and easy to use
base.uploadSupport: Supports txt,pdf, md,html,doc,docx,xls,xlsx,csv,ppt,pptx format files, up to 5 files can be uploaded at a time, each size does not exceed 20M
base.uploadSupportQna: It should be in the same format as the template file.

bots.deleteDesc: This operation will only delete the assistants in the assistant store and will not affect the assistants published on Telegram, Discord and other platforms. You can delete them on the corresponding platform
bots.deleteDescCn: Are you sure to delete this assistant?
bots.generateIconTooltip: Click AI Generate Button after enter your bot's name and description to auto generate an icon for you assisatant, you can generate icons up to 3 time.

label.name: Assistant name
label.notFoundTip1: Strategies when similar content is not found in the knowledge base
label.notFoundTip2: Autonomous reasoning: The robot will reason and reply on its own
label.notFoundTip3: Fixed reply: Reply based on specified text
label.previewDesc: You can debug and preview the effect of the current assistant here
label.searchCounts: Number of items retrieved in a single time
label.searchCountsTip: The maximum number of paragraphs retrieved from the knowledge base for a single question and answer. The default is 3. Increasing the number will increase token consumption. Be careful not to exceed the maximum context of the model.
label.similarityTip1: When the similarity is high (such as 0.8 or above), only knowledge that is highly relevant to the problem will be retrieved, which will be more accurate, and it will also be easier to miss.
label.similarityTip2: When the similarity is low (such as below 0.7), content with low relevance may be retrieved, but the retrieval scope will be wider.
label.temperatureTip: The higher the temperature, the more creative and uncertain the response will be, and the lower the temperature, the more rigorous the response will be.
label.turnsTip:
Sets the number of dialogue history rounds brought into the model context. 
The more rounds there are, the higher the relevance of the multi-round dialogue, but the more Tokens are consumed.

bots.notReadyYet: More functions are being opened one after another, so stay tuned

place.description: Introduce the functions of the assistant, which will be displayed to users of the assistant
place.name: Give your assistant a unique name
place.conversationStyle: Select the style of the assistant's conversation

placeholder.prologue: Fill in the assistant's opening statement copy and click the auto-generate button to automatically generate the opening statement.
placeholder.prologuePreset: Fill in the preset questions, or click the auto-generate button to generate
placeholder.suggestion: After each assistant replies, automatically provides 3 suggest questions based on the conversation content.
placeholder.tipWords: These are your settings and requirements for the robot. The more specific you are, the better the effect will be. For example: Please act as the gold medal customer service of the platform and answer any questions from users based on the known information provided.

publish.configured: Please configure your bot's website share info first.
publish.discord: Interact with assistants in Discord private chats, group chats, and channels
publish.instagram: Connect Assistant to Instagram Direct Messenger.
publish.javascriptDes: Supports adding chatbots anywhere on the website

label.sercuritySub: Enable password protection for your assistant so that the assistant's URL can only be accessed after entering the password
label.shopDes: Publish to the assistant store and support creating assistant copies
label.with: and chat with the bot in

publish.line: Interact with your assistant in private LINE chat.
publish.messenger: Chat with your assistant on Messenger and share with others using a meta business account.

placeholder.passwordVali: The password length must be 4-10 characters, can be any combination of numbers or letters

publish.reddit: Chat with your assistant on Reddit
publish.robotDes: Supports configuring bots on the website
publish.slack: Use Assistant to be more productive in your Slack workspace.
publish.subtitle: By posting your Assistant on the following third-party platforms, you indicate that you have fully understood and agreed to abide by the platform's terms of service (including but not limited to any privacy policy, community guidelines, data processing agreement, etc.)
publish.telegram: Interact with Assistant in Telegram private chats, group chats, and channels
publish.title: Choose publishing platform
publish.websiteDes: Users can chat directly with your bot at this link

bots.s: Only PNG, JPG Image Files Can Be Uploaded!
bots.unpublishDesc: This operation will only remove the assistant from the assistant store. If you need to revoke the authorization of the social media platform, please go to the release page to perform the operation.
bots.ww: Avatar images must be in JPG or PNG format and must not exceed 5MB in size

common.aiGenerateMaxLength: The number of times generated today has reached the upper limit. Please try again tomorrow or upload your favorite pictures instead.

forgotPassword.resetEmailFailed: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.

login.needPassword: Please confirm the password for other options.
login.re-login: The authentication has expired. Please log in again!

login.userNotFound: No user found with this email address. Please check the email or register.
login.weakPassword: The password is too weak. Please enter a stronger password with at least 6 characters.
